attributes.action: Cancel Wimpledon Tennis Championships and the London Olympics because the British people are to be deprived of the Red Arrows display.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel the banning of the Red Arrows Display Team should be accompanied by the banning of all militaristic displays including The Edinburgh Tattoo, The Changing of the Guard and any RAF flypast in London or anywhere else in the UK on the grounds it may upset the tourists who come to watch such events.  Wimbledon should also be banned because of the prescence of military personnel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
